prompts: Create a small bat-like Pokemon with vibrant purple wings and a blue body.
Imagine a flying-type Pokemon that thrives in caves and forests with a sleek design.
Design a Pokemon resembling a bat, featuring large wings and a playful personality.
Give me a Pokemon that is primarily blue with purple accents and loves to explore urban areas.
Show me a creature that can hide in the shadows, with a unique mix of blue and purple colors.
Generate a Pokemon that flits through the air, showcasing its distinct bat-like features and vibrant colors.
Make an adorable bat Pokemon that can be found in mountainous regions and has a curious nature.
